name: com.unity.xrtools.module-loader
description:
The XR Tools Module Loader package enables multiple systems to coexist within a single project and interact with each other in a predictable, configurable way.
It instantiates and loads modules in the Editor and in Player builds and provides control over which modules are active and APIs for getting access to modules.

samples.description: Example code that demonstrates basic module types and prints to the log
